article_text:
Saying goodbye to Brooks

NC legislators discuss pros and cons of proposed tuition cut bill

Valedictorian will be sad to see current honor system eliminated

Women's Leadership Academy valedictorian proud of first graduating class

New process for boarding Wake school buses explained

02:39

article_metadata.news-keywords: Pat McCrory, budget, health, human services, General Assembly, Medicaid
article_metadata.description: Gov. Pat McCrory may mean well when it comes to his Health and Human Services budget proposal, but the governor’s goals to improve health care for North Carolinians are far too modest. And they’re hindered by his preoccupation with HB2.
article_metadata.title: McCrory’s budget should aim higher | News & Observer
